casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Fairell, Appellant.
Submitted November 8, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and BarBJLERI, J J.
Frederick D. Wood, for appellant.
Bonnie Brig anee Leadbetter and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Orawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
December 20, 1971:
